sentence.Network_en: She won admiration for her comportment during the trial.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在选拔赛中的表现得到了赞赏。

sentence.Network_en: I was touched deeply for his comportment to work.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对工作的态度深深打动了我.

sentence.Network_en: Their gee - whiz, faux - naif comportment is not always convincing ( Madison Bell )
sentence.Network_cn: 他们耸人听闻的, 假纯朴的表现并不总是有说服力的 ( 麦迪逊贝尔 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一举一动的举是什么意思_百度知道 ... 举措[ act] 举动[ comportment] 举发[ expose, denounce].

list.abs: He comports himself like a hero ., 他立身如英雄.
The child turned to its mother comport ., 那孩子向母亲求安慰.
suzhou comport hydraulic lifting machinery co. , ltd ., 苏州康博特液压升降机械有限公司.
AUTRES 别的comportements anormaux 不正常的行为agite 手舞足蹈

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French comportement, from the verb comporter, from Latin comportare (see comport)

auth_sentence.content: Ethics, of course, is another one and comportment studies brought a lot to this goal to.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ethics, of course, is another one and comportment studies brought a lot to this goal to.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ethics, of course, is another one and comportment studies brought a lot to this goal to.

auth_sentence.content: Weil-Curiel said, I'm for the veil law because it all starts there, it indicates a comportment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Weil-Curiel said, I'm for the veil law because it all starts there, it indicates a comportment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Weil-Curiel said, I'm for the veil law because it all starts there, it indicates a comportment.

auth_sentence.content: But what am I as an educator supposed to do when the comportment of my students is frankly pathological?
auth_sentence.res_content: But what am I as an educator supposed to do when the comportment of my students is frankly pathological?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But what am I as an educator supposed to do when the comportment of my students is frankly pathological?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
